name: iBasket Gunner
description:
After the success of iBasket, which has been played by over 15 million players in over 120 countries worldwide, the new iBasket gunner is now available to take you back to your arcade days.

With amazing 3d graphics, this new version of the famous iBasket original provides an authentic arcade shootout style experience. A true five star experience.

3 game play modes:

- Time Up: score as many baskets as possible in a given time period.

- Multiplayer: play against friends and other rivals from all over the world. The challenge has been issued!

- Level up: just you against the computer. Help yourself by using power ups and avoid power downs to get the highest score possible.

Play the game with your Facebook account and see which of your friends has the highest score. Be careful- it's addictive!

As you play, various power ups will appear to help you improve your score.

- Make the basket bigger

- Freeze the basket's movement.

- Double points

- Triple points

- Slow down the basket

- Watch out for power downs!

Beware of power downs! Touching the ball will result in set backs to your progress.
